lines.text: Well... if he was trying to use <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit,</c> but his robes got charred...
Maybe he hadn't used the spell before, and was expecting it to work differently.
Like, it says it makes you immune to fire, but maybe it doesn't make your clothes immune to fire.
Or maybe he cast it at the wrong time, and he was already on fire before he cast it.
Either way, he could've panicked and aborted the spell.
It's not a sure thing, though- you're positin' he messed up in that specific way.
There's no more obvious problem in the way of him castin' it?
